entries.journal_entry_completion_summary: The crew is dead, the scientists are dead, only the creatures remain. You must report back to agent Taarna. Let him know what is going on, and find this queen that the journal referred to.
entries.journal_entry_description: This search for the missing crew has turned grim. There is nothing but corpses and these ever-stronger creatures. Find out why these creatures keep attacking the crew and do whatever is left to help them.
entries.task00_journal_entry_description: See if you can locate something in the lair that has some information about the raiding party sent against the creature lair.
entries.task00_journal_entry_title: Search for Clues About the Survivors
entries.task00_waypoint_name: Lair at the End of the Trail of Blood
entries.task01_journal_entry_description: The bloody datapad has only one entry, "...We're being used for food. The captain died protecting me. The lab knows nothing about the intelligence these creatures are exhibiting. They ambushed us on the way to their lair, and every time I use my datapad, the creatures seem to get agitated. Their life stages are progressing far faster than anticipated. The Empire would have paid quite well for these if we had actually made it to..." The entry ends there.
entries.task01_message_box_text: The bloody datapad has only one entry, "...We're being used for food. The captain died protecting me. The lab knows nothing about the intelligence these creatures are exhibiting. They ambushed us on the way to their lair, and every time I use my datapad, the creatures seem to get agitated. Their life stages are progressing far faster than anticipated. The Empire would have paid quite well for these if we had actually made it to..." The entry ends there.
entries.task02_journal_entry_description: There were no survivors in the raiding party. Try to find the other group.
entries.task03_journal_entry_description: Kill all of the creatures to be found in the camp.
entries.task04_journal_entry_description: Kill all of the creatures to be found in the camp.
entries.task05_journal_entry_description: The camp appears to be empty. This does not bode well for any chance of rescuing any remaining survivors.
entries.task06_journal_entry_description: There are no signs of any of the crash survivors. Things are looking rather bleak for your rescue operation.
entries.task06_journal_entry_title: Search the Camp for Any Further Clues
entries.task07_comm_message_text: You're saying the entire camp was killed? We can't let these creatures continue to proliferate. There must be some sort of breeder in the area. The person in the trideo mentioned another lair nearby, try and find it and see if it contains anything that might be creating these creatures.
entries.task07_journal_entry_description: You found a trideo disc containing the last moments of the survivors. It apparently was being used to record a goodbye to one of the crew's family, but you don't think they will want to see what happens next.
entries.task08_journal_entry_description: Kill the breeder creatures and put an end to this threat.
entries.task09_journal_entry_description: Some of the creatures are trying to prevent you from getting to the breeders. Destroy these guards.
entries.task10_journal_entry_description: Some of the creatures are trying to prevent you from getting to the breeders. Destroy these guards.
entries.task11_journal_entry_description: Clear out the lair and kill any breeder creatures you find.
entries.task12_journal_entry_description: See if you can find any information about the crash victims or the creatures.
entries.task13_comm_message_text: Oh no, this can't be real. You say there is still a queen for these things still alive? I've had the trajectory of the wreck traced and it took off from an area near Dearic. Head back to me and I will send out a scouting party to search the area around Dearic. We have got to find this queen before it's too late!
entries.task13_journal_entry_description: Contact agent Taarna about the information found in the datapad.
entries.task14_journal_entry_description: Return to agent Taarna and see if he has been able to find anything leading to the location of the queen creature.
